TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseChannelObjectWithProperties extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IDictionary, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public MustInherit Class BaseChannelObjectWithProperties Implements IDictionary
public ref class BaseChannelObjectWithProperties abstract : System::Collections::IDictionary
type BaseChannelObjectWithProperties = class interface IDictionary interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 提供信道对象的基实现，该对象要向其属性公开字典接口。

span.span: Provides a base implementation of a channel object that exposes a dictionary interface to its properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是类的基类和。 is the base class for and . 和可以用作基类的信道和信道接收器提供的名为属性。 and can be used as the base classes for channels and channel sinks that provide named properties. 处理要求通道对象为其属性的复杂任务。 handles the complex task of asking a channel object for its properties. 此类，可以链接要求并且在类级别继承要求。This class makes a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level. 一个直接调用方或派生的类不包含基础结构权限时引发。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have infrastructure permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)并[继承需求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples [!code-cpp[CommonTransportKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CommonTransportKeys/CPP/commontransportkeys.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CommonTransportKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CommonTransportKeys/CS/commontransportkeys.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CommonTransportKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CommonTransportKeys/VB/commontransportkeys.vb#1)]

permission.span: 用于操作的基础结构代码。

span.span: For operating with infrastructure code.
Demand value: ; Permission value:

para.span: 继承自，必须重写属性和属性。

span.span: When you inherit from , you must override the property and the property.
